name: BLOCK'D - Block Physics Puzzle Adventure
description:
BLOCK'D

Simply Touch the Blocks to maneuver the Ball to the Goal!

THERE ARE DIFFERENT TYPES OF BLOCKS!

- BROWN - Tap to Shrink!
- BLUE - Tap to Spin!
- Green - Hit to Bounce!
- Red - Tap to Move Up!
- ICE - Tap to Move Left!

FEATURES:

- Get the Ball to the Goal!
- Perfect for Kids!
- Very fun Family Puzzle game!
- Tap to Shrink and Move the Blocks!
- FIFTY (50) Free Levels!
- Three Separate Worlds!
- Hours of Clever FUN!
- Find the Hidden Star in each World!
- Game-center Achievements to Unlock!

THREE WORLDS!

COSMIC - Outer Space!
ROCKY - A fiery rocky abyss!
ICE - A cold Icy Freeze!


Try our other games! www.AerApps.com
